description.label: Description
description.value: An Elemental is a mindless construct formed from the natural elements with magic binding it together. It has no Intelligence, Willpower, or Fellowship Characteristics, and need never Test them. For the purposes of calculating its Wounds, use its Strength Bonus in place of Willpower Bonus. By default, Elementals cause Fear 2 unless their size increases this effect. Elemental attacks are Magical. Mundane (non-Magical) attacks that hit an Elemental ignore their Qualities and do not cause a minimum of 1 Damage.
